text:
1. Stand in front of the punching bag.
2. Make a fist with your dominant hand.
3. Extend your arm forward.
4. Rotate your hips and shoulders.
5. Punch the bag with force.
6. Recoil your arm back to the starting position.
7. Repeat the punching motion multiple times.
8. Maintain proper form and technique throughout the exercise.
9. Take breaks as needed.
10. Continue punching the bag for the desired duration of the workout.
